articles.title: Shirley Knight dead: Oscar nominated actress and Desperate Housewives star dies aged 83 - Express
articles.description: SHIRLEY KNIGHT, American actress best known for The Dark at the Top of the Stairs and Sweet Bird of Youth, has died aged 83, her daughter confirmed.

articles.description: The Beatles are set to host a one time only sing-a-long version of their 'Yellow Submarine' film on YouTube this weekend (April 25).
articles.content:
